title: Example Application Documentation
long: This is the included dox example application which contains endpoints about words.  It serves the application data from some statically located json files.  If necessary, these can be put behind an authentication wall (or served via your application) if you need to password-protect your docs.

apis.title: User
apis.name: user
apis.short: An API for interacting with users.
apis.long: This API can be used to post new users (with authentication information), modify existing users, and other related information, but can also be used to post new social users and retrieve submodels related to users.
